description_for_human: Plugin for searching for microbiome studies or sample
description_for_model: Plugin for searching for studies or samples relating to microbiomes in NMDC. You can search for studies by environment type and omics type (e.g. Proteomics, Metabolomics, Genomics, Transcriptomics) and get a list of studies. If a call to the plugin fails, do not continue, just report the error to the user.
